short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick a random Netflix movie or show!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of scrolling endlessly on Netflix? Let NetFlicks surprise you! This simple Chrome extension helps you pick a random movie or show from the current Netflix page - whether it's your main feed, any genre , or even a custom list.

How it works:

1.Open Netflix and browse any page (e.g., Home, Trending, My List).
2.Click the NetFlicks extension icon in your toolbar.
3. Hit "Pick a Random Show"!

Discover new favorites instantlyâ€”no more decision fatigue.
